subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, Sept. 4 (AP) — Five months after the Tribune Company announced plans to sell the Chicago Cubs, the first-place club is making more noise on the field than its corporate owners are in a slow-moving sale process.
snippet: CHICAGO, Sept. 4 (AP) — Five months after the Tribune Company announced plans to sell the Chicago Cubs, the first-place club is making more noise on the field than its corporate owners are in a slow-moving sale process.
